alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 1:07AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect extreme western Piscataquis... far northwest Aroostook and Somerset Counties... At 105 AM EDT...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Lac Frontiere to 14 miles north of Eustis to 6 miles west of Conway...and moving east AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Clayton Lake, Saint Pamphile, Saint Juste, Monson, Blanchard, Caucomgomoc Lake, Nine-mile Bridge, Baker Lake, Lobster Lake, Billy-Jack Depot, Lobster Township, Kingsbury Plantation, Chesuncook, Elliottsville, Shirley and Beaver Cove. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
